course.title: ADM 1340 Financial Accounting (3 units)
course.desc: This course introduces students to the financial statements of an organization and the accounting system that produces them. Emphasis is placed on understanding the role the financial statements play in communicating meaningful information about the firm, and how estimates and accounting policy choices affect the numbers in the statements.Course Component: Discussion Group, LecturePrerequisite: ADM 1100 or ADM 1300
